message_1:
A survey was conducted to determine the relationship between the height and weight of students in a school. A factor analysis was performed to identify underlying factors that contribute to the variation of the data. The factor analysis yielded four factors that explain 60% of the total variation. 

What is the percentage of the total variation explained by the first factor?
message_2: Without more information about the individual contributions of each factor, it is impossible to determine the exact percentage of the total variation explained by the first factor.
